channel.title: The good stuff
channel.description:
Yeah, drugs... etc.
What drugs are you into/looking forward to trying?
I myself have recently become emo over a dumb bitch of a girl, and shall now turn to drugs for an answer even though I know it won't help. [size=5pt]OK, minus the emo part but the girl is a dumb bitch.[/size]
Anyway, PERSONALLY... I'm looking forward to trying Salvia. Nothing else. I've tried weed and oxy cotton. Weed sucks. Oxy cotton I might try again.
I've heard many things about salvia, ranging from good to horrible. What are your views on this legal drug?
Whatever, I'm stupid for being ambitious. JME I heard you're fucked. Give me your insights NOW!

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

If you have any “Big Bee”, or “Big Bear” in your town try those…? Like, big commercial convenience stores (not 7/11)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 07-05-2008, 14:57:43[/size][hr]Went to some store on the mountain and asked for it and she took it out of the glass container, no questions asked.

$11 for .25G? That’s some expensive fuckin’ shit. Lol.

Read full topic

Is this the Gravity Bong you were talking about PaulT?
http://www.rollies.com/Pipes/View.php?SerialNum=RED-T90-BLUE[/quote]$9.99 CAD for 40X Extract at some convenience store, lol.

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @antiyou antiyou
item.description:
@antiyou wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:25, topic:202602”][quote author=antiyou link=topic=267272.msg2210645#msg2210645 date=1209861614]

Not sure what people are saying about salvia being shit, it’s arguably one of the most intense drugs in the world and probably will be the most intense experience in your life.

You just have to do it right, and know what you are doing. It doesn’t so well work for idiots

All I can really say is reading everything you can find on salvia in the erowid vaults. There is probably a really good FAQ to read on it.

Rofl, I had 70x and all it did was making me gimp out, no intense at all. But if you really want to most intense trip in your life go find some DMT
[/quote]

You probably didn’t smoke it properly, and keep in mind that it takes a good 3-4 times until you get any strong effects usually.[/quote]

Hahahaha, smoked it correctly, out of a pipe and a bong, held in for 30 secs, it just doesnt work for some people yo

Read full topic

No, but you are an idiot.

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

The store may well refuse to serve you anyway, around here the headshops will rarely serve under 18s for anything - even unregulated stuff - it helps present a good impression to the council man who tries to shut them down on a regular basis.

Read full topic

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:21, topic:202602”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=267272.msg2208828#msg2208828 date=1209787550]
Uhm… In Canada I believe you need to be 19 to buy it… :S

Isn’t it that, the salvia trip weakens after each time you have it?
[/quote]

Nope. It’s completely unregulated. You need to be 19 to buy tobacco, not salvia.

As for tolerance, both of you are wrong

Salvia isn’t just any drug Salvia actually has reverse tolerance. The more you smoke, the LESS you need and the stronger effects you will get. Usually it’ll take a few tries until you even get a good effect.[/quote]What the hell, seriously? That’s nuts.

I need to like, print out some legal shit from wikipedia if they try n stop me from buying it in Canada then n be all like BITCH SAY WAT

Read full topic

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:19, topic:202602”]Uhm… In Canada I believe you need to be 19 to buy it… :S

Isn’t it that, the salvia trip weakens after each time you have it?[/quote]

Nope. It’s completely unregulated. You need to be 19 to buy tobacco, not salvia.

As for tolerance, both of you are wrong

Salvia isn’t just any drug Salvia actually has reverse tolerance. The more you smoke, the LESS you need and the stronger effects you will get. Usually it’ll take a few tries until you even get a good effect.

Read full topic

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:19, topic:202602”]Uhm… In Canada I believe you need to be 19 to buy it… :S

Isn’t it that, the salvia trip weakens after each time you have it?[/quote]

Your body will develop a tolerance to any drug you take often enough. If you’re talking about doing it once a month it shouldn’t make much of a difference at all.

Read full topic

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“nohope, post:17, topic:202602”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=267272.msg2208179#msg2208179 date=1209760175]
Some legal feel good drugs are kava kava, kratom, lsa, alcohol, ginseng, marinol, and love.
[/quote]
He said it was a drug.[/quote]

Oh, you should have quoted pault because I thought you were talking about Uriko. I was like, where da fuck is he getting this from.

Well love is a pretty lousy drug then, lol. Costs a shitload of money and it doesn’t get you high. Maybe the occasional orgasm though.

Read full topic

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

PaulT:

Some legal feel good drugs are kava kava, kratom, lsa, alcohol, ginseng, marinol, and love.

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:13, topic:202602”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=267272.msg2207720#msg2207720 date=1209714949]
I want to anally rape people with a rusty police baton who say “Oxy Cotton”.

Other than that, hi.
[/quote]
OxyContin? Sorry, I refer it to the street name to sound cool.

edit: jme kthx. I was gonna read up on it some more… I was actually gonna buy some 40x extract today for $10. Lol. I was lookin’ at the pipe’s n he was like y’wanna buy? And I looked at the salvia n was like what about this?

He’s like are you legal age? n I changed the topic right away… TBH all I have to say is ‘yes, but I forgot my ID at home’. Anyway I’m looking forward to trying it ;o

btw jme, you use a bong for it or a pipe? Which gives you the best hit;o[/quote]

I use a bong, but personally I don’t fill it up with water because things can get messy on salvia hehe. Also there is no legal age for salvia, it’s completely uncontrolled. Some stores may choose not to sell it though.

[quote=“PaulT, post:14, topic:202602”]A bong is better for salvia. A gravity bong (google it if you don’t know how to make it, it’s easy) is best.

Salvia is scary. At 20x I’ve had trips that lasted several years in a few minutes. It can have a big impact on the way you think and your way of life, even a long time after your trip. It isn’t always fun, in fact for me it often isn’t. Just make sure you’re sitting down.

Some legal feel good drugs are kava kava, kratom, lsa, alcohol, ginseng, marinol, and love.[/quote]

That sounds awefully strong for 20x. I’ve done many massive 40x hits now, and I haven’t quite tripped for years, but usually it feels like I’ve been fucked for eternity. Like if I’m tripping out in some other reality, all my past memories are simply being in that reality and the REAL reality has never existed and I know nothing about it. [quote=“nohope, post:15, topic:202602”]Love is the only drug (As you said it was a drug) That I would do.[/quote]

Love isn’t a drug, and he never said it was. No idea what you are talking about. In my opinion you should do yourself a favor (and us) and stay out of the drug topics.

Read full topic

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

Love is the only drug (As you said it was a drug) That I would do.

Read full topic

item.title: The good stuff
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

A bong is better for salvia. A gravity bong (google it if you don’t know how to make it, it’s easy) is best.

Salvia is scary. At 20x I’ve had trips that lasted several years in a few minutes. It can have a big impact on the way you think and your way of life, even a long time after your trip. It isn’t always fun, in fact for me it often isn’t. Just make sure you’re sitting down.

Some legal feel good drugs are kava kava, kratom, lsa, alcohol, ginseng, marinol, and love.

Read full topic

edit: jme kthx. I was gonna read up on it some more… I was actually gonna buy some 40x extract today for $10. Lol. I was lookin’ at the pipe’s n he was like y’wanna buy? And I looked at the salvia n was like what about this?

He’s like are you legal age? n I changed the topic right away… TBH all I have to say is ‘yes, but I forgot my ID at home’. Anyway I’m looking forward to trying it ;o

btw jme, you use a bong for it or a pipe? Which gives you the best hit;o
